messages.zh: 第三十一（后）
......已经到达目标地点。
messages.en: ......I'm in the destination now.

messages.zh: 消灭了路上徘徊着的小股整合运动。除此之外，没有发现其它异常情况。
messages.en: I have eliminated the small group of Removement Union,except this, all clear.

messages.zh: 报告完毕。
messages.en: Out.

messages.zh: 霜叶......你一路怎么老皱着眉头？
messages.en: Frostleaf…...Why do you frown all the way?

messages.zh: 我只是有点在意阿米娅她们的状况。
messages.en: I just worried about the situtation of Amiya them.

messages.zh: 阿米娅她们已经回到罗德岛了。
messages.en: Amiya they have already come back to Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 临光和杜宾一个星期前就已动身前往什么地方——
messages.en: Nearl and Dobermann have set out to somewhere a week ago——

messages.zh: 同时出动她们两个，应该是挺艰难的任务。
messages.en: They set out togther, it should be a tough mission

messages.zh: 黑钢和企鹅物流也有自己的事情要处理。
messages.en: Black Steel and Penguin Logistics also have their business to deal with.

messages.zh: 啊，雷蛇前辈和芙兰卡前辈......
messages.en: Ah, senior Liskam and senior Franka

messages.zh: 她们平安就好......
messages.en: I hope they are OK…...

messages.zh: 你也要好好加油才行。
messages.en: You have to work hard,too.

messages.zh: 芙兰卡把你交到我手上的时候，可是很看好你的。
messages.en: When Franka let me lead you, she Very optimistic about you.
R…...really?

messages.zh: ——她说，前提是你别那么怯生生的。
messages.en: ——she said that if you don’t twins…..
(cry sound).......

messages.zh: ......别突然就一副要哭出来的样子呀！你可是黑钢的一员......！
messages.en: ......don’t suddenly  to cry! You are one of the member of Black Steel!
I, I’m not….

messages.zh: ......不管怎么说，我们接下来的任务，就是要侦查这个废城的各个区域。
messages.en: ......Whatever, our next mission, is to scout each area of this ruin.

messages.zh: 虽然不是什么特别危险的任务，但也得小心谨慎。
messages.en: Though is is not a very danger mission, we must be careful.

messages.zh: 嗯，嗯。
messages.en: en,en

messages.zh: 了解。
messages.en: Got it .

messages.zh: 接下来......该是我们认真工作的时候了。
messages.en: Next…...now it’s time to work hard

messages.zh: 啊......博士，你来了。
messages.en: Ah…….Doctor, you are here.

messages.zh: 来得刚好，Dr.{@nickname}。
messages.en: Just on time, Dr.player.

messages.zh: 我们这边的活儿也干的差不多了，得暂时离开一段时间~
messages.en: We almost finish our work at here, we need to leave for a while~

messages.zh: （惋惜）
messages.en: (pitty)

messages.zh: 很快就能再见面的。
messages.en: We will meet again very soon.

messages.zh: 只要过一小段时间，我们就能回到罗德岛重新待命。
messages.en: We will come back to Rhodes island and wating for orders after a short time.

messages.zh: 可不要太想我哦。
messages.en: Don’t miss me so much.

messages.zh: 唉唉，可惜可惜，我们这边没有那样的正经理由呢，德克萨斯。
messages.en: Ahhhh, what a pitty, we dont have the formal reason like them, Texas

messages.zh: 你给我等等......
messages.en: You give me and so on…..

messages.zh: 企鹅物流马上要回去休假咯！
messages.en: Penguin Logistics will go to hoilday at once!

messages.zh: 虽然只有宝贵的一天，但是！但是——
messages.en: Through we only have one precious day,but! But——

messages.zh: ......抱歉。不是适合在这种场合说的东西。
messages.en: .......Sorry, not something suitable for this atomsphere.

messages.zh: 不会......休息也是必要的。
messages.en: No…...rest is nessnary,too.

messages.zh: ......这句话，理应是我说给你听。
messages.en: ......that’s the word I should talk to you.

messages.zh: 没错没错。阿米娅，你啊，也该好好休息一下了。
messages.en: Yeah yeah, Amiya, you, should have a good rest.

messages.zh: 罗德岛还有必须要处理的事情......
messages.en: I still have things that must be deal with….in Rhodes lsland

messages.zh: 我能理解，但是阿米娅，你可不能给自己太多压力。
messages.en: I understood, but Amiya, you can't put too much pressure on yourself.

messages.zh: 即使信念强大，一直劳累下去，身体也会承受不住的。
messages.en: Even if the belief is strong, you will continue to work hard and your body will not be able to withstand it.

messages.zh: 你可不能病倒了，大家都指望着你呢。
messages.en: You cannot get sick and down, everybody is watching you.

messages.zh: 我......一直受到大家的关照。
messages.en: I...has always been taken care of by everyone.

messages.zh: 但你战斗的身姿也鼓励了大家。
messages.en: But your fighting posture also encourages everyone.

messages.zh: 不论如何，这就够了。
messages.en: Whatever, that’s enough.

messages.zh: 趁这个机会，我要去罗德岛做个免费的身体检查，然后再回去。
messages.en: With this opportunity, I am going to Rhodes Island for a free physical examination and then going back.

messages.zh: 我们的任务也差不多结束了。接下来......
messages.en: We almost finish our tast, next…...

messages.zh: 阿米娅，{@nickname}博士。
messages.en: Amiya, Dr.player.

messages.zh: 我在听。
messages.en: I’m listening.

messages.zh: 加油~                                                 Cheer up !
messages.en: Cheer up!
Ah…...what?

messages.zh: 汇报结束之后，我们会立即返回。
很快就能再见面的。
messages.en: We will meet very soon.
Everybody….I…….
.......ok. Please take care of yourself.

messages.zh: 下次再见。
messages.en: See you next time.

messages.zh: 博士。
messages.en: Doctor.

messages.zh: 我得再去龙门外围的贫民窟看看。应该能帮上忙。
messages.en: I need to go to the outedge of the Slum of Lungmen, I should give them a hand at there.

messages.zh: （担心）
messages.en: (Worry)

messages.zh: 没事的，博士。
messages.en: No problem, doctor.

messages.zh: 红正在龙门执行其他任务。
messages.en: Red is performing other tasks at Lungmen

messages.zh: 有她在，你可以放心。
messages.en: You don’t need to worry when she is there.
